action.action-desc: Mr. Nehls (for himself, Mr. Van Drew, Mr. Babin, Mr. Tiffany, Mr. Jackson, Mr. Weber of Texas, Mrs. Boebert, and Mr. Gohmert) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to limit the ability to take into account the mental health of an applicant for asylum.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Asylum Claims Improvement Act of 2022.

subsection.text: Section 208(b) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1158(b)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: For purposes of the consideration of a claim of asylum by an alien under this subsection, the mental health of the alien may not be taken into account.

subsection.text: Section 241(b)(3) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1231(b)(3)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: For purposes of a determination under this paragraph, the mental health of the alien may not be taken into account.
